text: Susan Silvey (born 17 September 1956), known professionally as Susie Silvey or sometimes Suzie Silvey, is an English actress, dancer and model. She was active in the 1970s and 1980s. Silvey was born in London. She also appeared in the movies Come Play with Me (1977), The Playbirds (1978), The Stud (1978), The World Is Full of Married Men (1979), Xtro (1983), Fanny Hill (1983),Fanny Hill on the Internet Movie Database Blue Ice (1992), Shining Through (1992) and Splitting Heirs (1993). She also guest starred in television series Never the Twain and Howards' Way. Silvey also appeared in music videos for Paul McCartney, the Cure and the Joe Cocker video for 'Civilized Man' (1984).Silvey in the music video for 'Civilized Man' - YouTube ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:English television actors Category:English dancers Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from London Category:Models from London Category:Living people
title: Susie Silvey
